forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 61F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. S winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. S winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds N at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds N at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 5C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 16C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High near 60F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 45F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 18C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High near 65F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 49F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 45F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 61F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
